params._actionType: which of the 3 bounty types (above) to run.
params._expectedBounty: result from quote above, used for slippage handling can be a fixed amt (Base Bounty) or dynamic amt based on rewards removed from target user during execution (ineligible revenue, autocompound fee)

returns.bounty: in RDNT to be paid to Hunter (via vesting)

params._actionType: which of the 3 bounty types (above) to run.
params._execute: whether to execute this txn, or just quote what its execution would return
params._expectedBounty: result from quote above, used for slippage handling can be a fixed amt (Base Bounty) or dynamic amt based on rewards removed from target user during execution (ineligible revenue, autocompound fee)

returns.bounty: in RDNT to be paid to Hunter (via vesting)

params._baseBountyUsdTarget: Base Bounty is paid in RDNT, will scale to match this USD target value
params._bountyBooster: when bounties need boosting to clear queue, add this amount (in RDNT)
params._chef: CIC, to query bounties for ineligible emissions
params._hunterShare: % of reclaimed rewards to send to Hunter
params._lpMfd: LP MFD, to query bounties on expired locks + autocompounds
params._mfd: MFD, to send bounties as vesting RDNT to Hunter (user calling bounty)
params._priceProvider: PriceProvider service, to get RDNT price for bounty quotes

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns.actionType: which of the 3 bounty types (above) to run.  getBestBounty returns this based on priority (expired locks first, then inelig emissions, then autocompound)
returns.bounty: amount of RDNT Hunter will recieve.  can be a fixed amt (Base Bounty) or dynamic amt based on rewards removed from target user during execution (ineligible revenue, autocompound fee)

executeBounty(address,bool,uint256,uint2.notice: Execute the most appropriate bounty on a user, check returned amount for slippage, calc amount going to Hunter, send to vesting.

getBaseBounty().notice: Return RDNT amount for Base Bounty.  Base Bounty used to incentivize operations that dont generate their own reward to pay to Hunter.

quote(address).notice: Given a user, return their bounty amount. uses staticcall to run same bounty aglo, but without execution
